titleStmt.title: Remarks upon the manners, religion and government of the Turks together with a survey of the seven churches of Asia, as they now lye in their ruines, and a brief description of Constantinople / by Tho. Smith ...
Epistolae duae. English
titleStmt.author: Smith, Thomas, 1638-1710.

notesStmt.note: Translation of the author's Epistolae duae, London, 1672.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
